languages.text: "Тебе не нужно это знание, эттфатер. В лесу есть тропы, по которым должно ходить лишь Волкам".
"You do not need that knowledge, Aett-Vater. There are paths in the forest that only Wolves ought to tread."
languages.original_text: "Тебе не нужно это знание, эттфатер. В лесу есть тропы, по которым должно ходить лишь Волкам".

traits.locale_text: "You do not need that knowledge, Aett-Vater. There are paths in the forest that only Wolves ought to tread."
"You do not need that knowledge, Aett-Vater. There are paths in the forest that only Wolves ought to tread."
"You do not need that knowledge, Aett-Vater. There are paths in the forest that only Wolves ought to tread."
"You do not need that knowledge, Aett-Vater. There are paths in the forest that only Wolves ought to tread."

languages.text: «No necesita saber eso, Aett-Vater. Hay caminos en el bosque que son solo para los Lobos».
languages.original_text: "You do not need that knowledge, Aett-Vater. There are paths in the forest that only Wolves ought to tread."

traits.locale_text: «No necesita saber eso, Aett-Vater. Hay caminos en el bosque que son solo para los Lobos».

languages.text: “你不需要知道这些事情，狼领。森林里有些路，只有野狼才能走。”
languages.original_text: "You do not need that knowledge, Aett-Vater. There are paths in the forest that only Wolves ought to tread."

traits.locale_text: “你不需要知道这些事情，狼领。森林里有些路，只有野狼才能走。”

languages.text: 「知る必要はない、アエット＝ヴァテル。森にはウルフだけが歩むべき道があるんだ」
languages.original_text: "You do not need that knowledge, Aett-Vater. There are paths in the forest that only Wolves ought to tread."

traits.locale_text: 「知る必要はない、アエット＝ヴァテル。森にはウルフだけが歩むべき道があるんだ」

languages.text: « Vous n'avez pas besoin de le savoir, aett-vater. Il y a dans la forêt des sentiers que seuls les Wolves doivent emprunter. »
languages.original_text: "You do not need that knowledge, Aett-Vater. There are paths in the forest that only Wolves ought to tread."

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'avez pas besoin de le savoir, aett-vater. Il y a dans la forêt des sentiers que seuls les Wolves doivent emprunter. »

languages.text: "Dieses Wissen braucht Ihr nicht, Aett-Vater. Es gibt Pfade im Wald, die nur Wölfe betreten sollten."
languages.original_text: "You do not need that knowledge, Aett-Vater. There are paths in the forest that only Wolves ought to tread."

traits.locale_text: "Dieses Wissen braucht Ihr nicht, Aett-Vater. Es gibt Pfade im Wald, die nur Wölfe betreten sollten."

languages.text: "Bu bilgiye ihtiyacın yok Aett-Vater. Ormanda sadece Kurtların yürümesi gereken yollar vardır."
languages.original_text: "You do not need that knowledge, Aett-Vater. There are paths in the forest that only Wolves ought to tread."

traits.locale_text: "Bu bilgiye ihtiyacın yok Aett-Vater. Ormanda sadece Kurtların yürümesi gereken yollar vardır."
